name: Butt Putt
description:
Butt Putt was created after /u/TalentBot posted the idea to the  /r/CrazyIdeas subreddit. I fancied a fun project so got to work, and this is the result. It is highly unpolished. Play at the risk of your own sanity.

Only tested on Vive. If there's enough interest I will endeavour to make it work on Rift and other headsets too.

Good luck in there.

- Sim0wn3d
